name: oag-shared
description: Code that is used by all oag-tools
author: Frank Stock

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.spec.json JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=jasmine.js node --require source-map-support/register --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register ../../node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js --config="${JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH}" || true
